pages.text: Vairis Crystal may seem soft to the touch at first, but armor made of this metal is excellent at holding a hit, as well as reducing the negative impact of Toran attacks and Sticky Shackles effect. When fully equipped, this armor passively halves fall damage by bouncing slightly off surfaces.

Can be crafted on Lithum Altar, using $(#ea7f17)$(l)80 000 DE$() and following items:$(li)Diamond Helmet$(o) [Main]$()$(li)Vairis Crystal $(o)[x4]$()$(br2)Recovery after full ritual: $(#992032)$(l)1000 DRP$()
